name: AppCarousel
tag_list: apps, mobile, discovery, merchandise, monetize, app, carousel, showcasing, appstore, curating
overview:
AppCarousel - www.appcarousel.com - is the leader in app and content monetization across multiple screens.

Whether you need a turnkey app store solution or help monetizing content, you can trust AppCarousel to deliver.

Our white labelled custom app store platform lets you showcase and distribute content to your consumers, no matter what device they’re on.

We work with leading content providers to offer customized and licensed applications that will make your business stand out.

Our cross-platform Ad Mediation solution optimizes performance and revenue for your premium inventory while you maintain control.

As leaders in providing monetization solutions across connected devices, AppCarousel is your ideal partner wherever you fit in the application ecosystem. Backed by Wmode and its extensive history and pedigree in content and app management, AppCarousel provides solutions to make your application business vision a reality. From app stores and curation to payment and billing, we give you the competitive edge.
